root: ^Hoi Mate! When can I get down from your back? I'm starting to get bored here.
^Oh sorry Willow, I got carried away. Ahah.
^No worries, I'm always happy to help ya with your training, but then I wished I could do more than just, you know sit on your back.
^We could do more combat training if you want?
^That would be fun for sure, Sometimes I really want to be able to better at beating the crap out of our opponents!
^I could teach you, but you have to promise me not to use what I teach you in bad ways. My parents trained me to be responsible with my techniques.
^Ahah no worries, I wouldn't trust me self as well! I'm kinda like a wild element. Like my siblings used to say.
^Sometimes yeah, sometimes they are just a bunch of wankers!
^Sorry mate, I forgot you don't have siblings...
^Nah it's okay, you and the girls are like a family! So I'm fine.
^Well if ya say so, I'll take you on for that training by the way! I promise not to use it for evil.
^Awesome let's do that next time we chat!
